dcterms:creator: Milan Straka
Nikita Mediankin
Tom Kocmi
Zdeněk Žabokrtský
Vojtěch Hudeček
Jan Hajič
dcterms:description: SumeCzech is a large Czech news-based summarization dataset created by Straka et al. (2018). It contains more than a million documents, consisting of a headline, several sentences long abstract, and a full text. The dataset was collected from various Czech news websites.
dcterms:title: SumeCzech

dcterms:creator: Michal Konkol
Miloslav Konopík
Magda Ševčíková
Zdeněk Žabokrtský
Jana Straková
Milan Straka
dcterms:description: CoNLL-based Extended Czech Named Entity Corpus 2.0 is the largest and most up-to-date Czech named entity recognition dataset. It contains no nested entities, making the outputs easier to use for summarizers.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-based extended CNEC 2.0

dcterms:creator: Petr Marek
Štěpán Müller
dcterms:description: SumeCzech-NER is an annotated version of the SumeCzech dataset with named entities, published to promote replication of results and enable further research.
dcterms:title: SumeCzech-NER
